Texts.Eng:
FrackinUniverse adds a large amount of armors (and foods) and enhances some older ones, allowing for a greater variety of playstyles. These can be very useful through gameplay and provide exceptionally useful benefits!

^orange;Stats^reset; : Vanilla players may notice there are more than they are used to, and even the ones they are used to have different ranges. FU presents a wider variety of armor classes to spice up your play, and does the same with food.

If you are more interested in damage, pick up Power Armor or Hyper Power Armor to trade defensive stats for offensive ones. Alternatively, pick up Tank or Hyper Tank sets to outlast your enemy. They come in melee OR ranged! Fighting not quite your thing? Pick up an Exploration oriented set, and be at home in your environment! You're guaranteed to locate a set that suits your playstyle somewhere out there!

^orange;Resistances^reset; : Many armors in FU come with inherent resistances. Many biome weather effects will simply stop affecting you once you hit an appropriate amount, and various enemy attacks will do less damage. Nifty, right? It gets better; upgrade your armor, and those resistances will increase!

^orange;Bonuses^reset; : Most are increases to your stats, plenty are conditional.
Any that say ^green;+value^reset; are typically additive increases. It can be a little confusing, however. As example: if it gives +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance it increases your crit chance by a flat 3%, but if it says +^green;3^reset;% Energy Regen, that's 3% of your base. The easiest way to remember is to ask yourself...does it have a base of 0? If so, it likely is like Crit Chance! If a bonus says x^green;1.3^reset;, or ^green;More^reset;, that's a multiplier on the value you currently have. Have 1000% Damage somehow? 100% More (or 2x) would make it 2000%! Small note: Regen is usually per second.

Of course, some bonuses have hidden components we couldn't easily include, for tooltip space.
 Additionally, there are some other phrase uses to note. If a set bonus states that it grants immunity to ^green;ALL^reset; of a related effect, that typically means all biome weather ^orange;as well as^reset; specific status effects related to that element. For heat, that includes burning and even lava! For radiation, that includes rad-burn.
As a small side-note, some terms or symbols are used loosely. If you see a bonus with x/y, that means the bonuses are different based on how their conditions are met. For weapons, this means how many of that type. If you see something like (Machine) Pistols, that means the bonus applies to Machine Pistols OR Pistols. This is typically done for tooltip space.

^cyan;Mining Sets^reset; :
 Mining laser sets grant a lot more mining laser damage...but that bonus is reduced significantly if you are pairing them with something else. Using a mining laser with a pistol, as example: 2x Mining Laser Damage becomes 1.25x.
^orange;Colors^reset;: Colors are important in identifying and understanding bonuses. To start with, set bonuses are identified by a ^yellow;^reset;, while a ^green;^reset; is only visible in crafting interfaces to display resistances. If a bonus stat is ^green;GREEN^reset;, that means it is a good thing. ^red;RED^reset; means it is a bad thing. ^cyan;Cyan^reset; is for bonuses that are binary. They typically do not stack with similar effects. This will be especially apparent with various foods...so choose carefully. It is worth noticing that there is ONE exception to the rules regarding colors: Glow. If you see Glow in a color, that is usually the color of the glow effect.

^orange;Special Bonuses^reset; : Some sets have special bonuses that don't really display much information due to lack of space, an unfortunate limitation of the game.. Here, some bonuses will be explained.
^cyan;Adaptive Armor^reset;: Applies a defense multiplier that scales between the two listed values as your health moves between 10% (left) and 100% (right).
^cyan;Auto-Medic^reset;: More complicated than ordinary regeneration, this effect will restore more health per second at the cost of an equal percentage of energy. It will also decrease energy regen and increase energy regen lock-out multiplicatively at 2x the heal percent.

^cyan;Thorns^reset;: a nova of thorns when hit, ^cyan;Fire Burst^reset; makes a nova of fire instead.

^cyan;Summons Minions^reset;: summons short-lived allies to fight alongside you or distract enemies. These minions scale based on the lowest armor's tier, so upgrading it is essential! Upgrade ALL of the pieces.

^cyan;Life/Energy Shell^reset;: Gain damage absorption (shell) which scales based on your maximum resources (health, energy) to protect your health. Regenerates quickly if you haven't taken damage recently. ^cyan;Shell Immunities^reset; are granted only while the shell holds. The numbers specified refer to, in order: The capacity of the shield relative to the resource, the regeneration rate, and the delay upon taking damage before it begins regenerating. Special note: Due to balance concerns, Energy Shell has a minimum lockout time of 0.5 seconds, and a maximum regen rate of 50% per second.

^cyan;Gravity Normalization^reset;: Personal gravity too low? Up it goes. Too high? Down instead. Exception: Zero-gravity.

^cyan;Vital Power^reset; and ^cyan;Juggernaut^reset;: these effects are set bonus exclusive, and quite powerful; they grant one stat based on a percent of another. Vital power grants power as life, Juggernaut grants life as power.

^cyan;Undying Resolve^reset;: increases Protection as your life gets lower, up to the stated amount, while ^cyan;Immortal Resolve^reset; grants HP Regen instead. If a set grants either, it will grant ^cyan;Immortal Resolve^reset; to your pet.

^cyan;Dark Commander^reset;/^cyan;Beast Master^reset;: Increases Damage, Protection, HP and Speed of your pets (both) and crew (Dark Commander) by the listed percent, increases their jump ability by half of that, and regenerates HP at a sixth of that amount per second.

^cyan;Capturenaut^reset;: Increases pet count by 1, plus an additional 1 per 2 tiers (up to +2) of the lowest equipped set piece. Grants an additional +1 if using alongside the back item. This means a fully upgraded set will allow up to 5 additional pets!

^red;Wretchel Toxicity^reset;: Ingesting Wretchel reduces core stats and healing received, and drains health over time. These effects increase in severity the more you consume in a short time frame, as well as while your health is critically low. It will ^red;KILL^reset; you, if you are careless.

^cyan;Charisma^reset;: Your ability to bargain with Traders at space stations. The higher your charisma, the better the deal (and fatter your bank balance!)



^cyan;Pet/Crew Stat Inheritance^reset;:
Overall scaling is as follows: HP, directly from your character, rather than just equipped armor. Protection: applied as a multiplier to HP via a specific formula. Damage: directly from character sheet. Health Regen: Inherits as a flat amount, except in special cases (^cyan;Immortal Resolve^reset;, effects not covered by FU, etc.). If you have 100 health and 10% HP Regen, it will grant your pet 10 HP per second. If a stat isn't here, a pet most likely does not inherit it.
^yellow;Special notes^reset;: Be mindful when taking powerful buffs like ^cyan;Glass Cannon^reset;, as it will reduce their health noticeably.
Texts.Chs:
富兰克林宇宙增加了大量的盔甲（和食物）并增强了一些旧的盔甲，从而允许更多种类的游戏风格。这些在游戏中非常有用，并提供特别有用的好处！

^orange;统计^重置;：原版玩家可能会注意到比他们习惯的要多，甚至他们习惯的那些也有不同的范围。FU 提供了更多种类的盔甲类别来为您的游戏增添趣味，对食物也是如此。如果您对伤害更感兴趣，请选择 Power Armor 或 Hyper Power Armor 以将防御属性换取进攻属性。或者，拿起 Tank 或 Hyper Tank 套装来比敌人更持久。他们以近战或远程形式出现！打架不完全是你的事？选择一套以探索为导向的套装，在你的环境中如鱼得水！你一定会在外面的某个地方找到适合你游戏风格的套装！

^orange;抗性^重置;：FU 中的许多盔甲都带有固有的抗性。一旦你达到适当的数量，许多生物群落天气效果就会停止影响你，并且各种敌怪攻击造成的伤害会更少。很漂亮，对吧？它会变得更好;升级你的盔甲，那些抵抗力就会增加！

^orange;奖金^reset;： 大多数是增加你的统计数据，很多是有条件的。任何说 ^green;+value^reset;通常是加法增加。但是，这可能有点令人困惑。例如：如果它给出 +^green;3^reset;% 暴击率 它会将你的暴击率提高 3%，但如果它显示 +^绿色;3^reset;% 能量恢复，即你基础的 3%。记住的最简单方法是问问自己......它的底数是 0 吗？如果是这样，它很可能就像 Crit Chance！如果奖金显示 x^green;1.3^reset;，或 ^green;more^reset;，那是你当前拥有的值的乘数。不知何故有 1000% 的伤害？多 100%（或 2 倍）将使它达到 2000%！小提示：恢复通常是每秒。

当然，为了工具提示空间，一些奖励有一些我们无法轻易包含的隐藏组件。
此外，还有一些其他短语用法需要注意。如果一个系列奖励声明它赋予 ^green 免疫;全部^重置;的相关效果，这通常意味着所有生物群系的天气 ^orange;以及^reset;与该元素相关的特定状态效果。对于热量，这包括燃烧甚至熔岩！对于辐射，这包括辐射燃烧。
作为一个小的旁注，一些术语或符号使用得很松散。如果您看到带有 xy 的奖金，则表示奖金根据其条件的满足情况而有所不同。对于武器，这意味着该类型的数量。如果您看到类似 （Machine） Pistols 的内容，则表示该加成适用于 Machine Pistols 或 Pistols。这通常针对工具提示空间进行。

^cyan;挖矿集^reset;：
 采矿激光套装会造成更多的采矿激光伤害......但是如果你把它们与其他东西配对，这种奖励会大大减少。使用带有手枪的采矿激光，例如：2 倍采矿激光伤害变为 1.25 倍。
^橙色;颜色^reset;：颜色对于识别和理解加成很重要。首先，套装加成由 ^yellow 标识;^reset;，而 a ^green;^重置;仅在制作界面中可见以显示抗性。如果奖励统计数据为 ^green;GREEN^reset;，这意味着这是一件好事。^红;RED^reset;意味着这是一件坏事。^青色;青色^重置;适用于二进制的奖金。它们通常不会与类似的效果叠加。这在各种食物中尤其明显......所以请谨慎选择。值得注意的是，关于颜色的规则有一个例外：发光。如果您在某种颜色中看到 Glow，那通常是发光效果的颜色。

^orange;特别奖金^reset;：一些套装有特殊的奖励，由于空间不足，它们并没有真正显示太多信息，这是游戏的不幸限制..在这里，将解释一些奖励。
^cyan;Adaptive Armor^reset;： 应用防御乘数，当您的生命值在 10%（左）和 100%（右）之间移动时，该乘数在列出的两个值之间缩放。
^青色;Auto-Medic^reset;： 比普通再生更复杂，这个效果会以相同百分比的能量为代价每秒恢复更多的生命值。它还会减少能量恢复并增加能量恢复锁定，乘以 2 倍的治疗百分比。

^青色;Thorns^reset;：被击中时的荆棘新星，^cyan;火爆^reset;反而生成 Fire 的新星。

^cyan;召唤小兵^reset;：召唤短命的盟友与您并肩作战或分散敌人的注意力。这些小兵根据最低护甲的等级进行缩放，因此升级它是必不可少的！升级所有部件。

^cyan;LifeEnergy Shell^reset;： 获得伤害吸收（shell），它根据您的最大资源（生命、能量）进行缩放，以保护您的健康。如果你最近没有受到伤害，可以快速恢复。^青色;Shell 免疫^reset;仅在 shell 持有时授予。指定的数字依次是指：盾牌相对于资源的容量、再生速率以及开始再生前受到伤害的延迟。特别说明：出于平衡方面的考虑，能量外壳的最小锁定时间为 0.5 秒，最大恢复速率为每秒 50%。重力归一化^reset;： 个人重力太低？它继续前进。太高了？相反，向下。例外：零重力。

^青色;生命力^重置;和 ^青色;Juggernaut^reset;：这些效果是 set bonus 独有的，而且相当强大;他们根据另一个属性的百分比授予一个属性。生命力赋予生命作为力量，主宰赋予生命作为力量。

^青色;不朽决心^reset;：随着您的生命值降低，增加保护，最高可达规定的数量，而 ^cyan;不朽的决心^reset;改为提供 HP 恢复。如果一个集合允许其中任何一个，它将允许 ^cyan;不朽的决心^reset;给你的宠物。

^cyan;黑暗指挥官^reset;^青色;驯兽师^reset;：将你的宠物（两者）和船员（黑暗指挥官）的伤害、保护、生命值和速度提高所列的百分比，将他们的跳跃能力提高一半，并以每秒六分之一的速度恢复生命值。Capturenaut^reset;：宠物数量增加 1 只，每装备最低的套装每 2 级（最高 +2）增加 1 只。如果与背面物品一起使用，则额外获得 +1。这意味着完全升级的套装最多允许 5 只额外的宠物！

^red;Wretchel Toxicity^reset;： 摄入 Wretchel 会降低核心属性和接受的治疗效果，并随着时间的推移消耗生命值。您在短时间内消耗的越多，以及当您的健康状况严重不足时，这些影响的严重程度就会增加。它将 ^red;KILL^reset;如果你粗心大意的话。

^cyan;Charisma^reset;：你在空间站与商人讨价还价的能力。你的魅力越高，交易就越好（并且你的银行余额就越丰厚！



^青色;PetCrew Stat Inheritance^reset;：
总体缩放如下：HP，直接来自您的角色，而不仅仅是装备的盔甲。保护：通过特定公式作为 HP 的乘数。伤害：直接来自角色表。生命再生：作为固定量继承，特殊情况除外 （^cyan;Immortal Resolve^reset;、FU 未涵盖的效果等）。如果你有 100 点生命值和 10% 的生命恢复，它会给你的宠物每秒 10 点生命值。如果统计数据不在这里，宠物很可能不会继承它。
^yellow;特别说明^reset;：使用像 ^cyan 这样的强大增益时要小心;玻璃炮^reset;，因为它会显著降低他们的生命值。
